name: MetaPlanet
description: Swap your favourite crypto with the most intuitive platform on the BSC network. Get the most of every trade as we offer the lowest Gas and transaction fee on the DeFi space. MetaPlanet makes it a simple task to limit swap orders. Easy amount slider, order history log and expandable charts are the little details that make MetaPlanet a better experience. MetaPlanet uses the BSC eco-system, which translates to some of the lowest transaction/gas fees you will find anywhere.
